subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: With six races remaining until the start of this Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup, Dale Earnhardt Jr. is on the verge of not making the cut.
snippet: With six races remaining until the start of this Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup, Dale Earnhardt Jr. is on the verge of not making the cut.
